comments.body: Is this part of the KIP to change the default value?
Do we still want this change, even if Kafka Streams changes slip? Maybe ok, because people might write plain consumer/producer apps using the new fencing. Just double checking.
The KIP and mailing list just get updated with this minor change FYI

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +48,52 @@  val DefaultTransactionsMaxTimeoutMs: Int = TimeUnit.MINUTES.toMillis(15).toInt
  val DefaultTransactionalIdExpirationMs: Int = TimeUnit.DAYS.toMillis(7).toInt
  val DefaultAbortTimedOutTransactionsIntervalMs: Int = TimeUnit.SECONDS.toMillis(10).toInt
  val DefaultRemoveExpiredTransactionalIdsIntervalMs: Int = TimeUnit.HOURS.toMillis(1).toInt
}
